officialTitle: Lymphedema Prevention in Breast Cancer: a Simple Blind, Randomized, Prospective Clinical Trial of the Efficacy of Physical Therapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Circumference measurements of the upper limbs using at 5 cm intervals from the elbow fold preoperatively prior to randomization and then post-operatively on hospital discharge (between Day 3 and Day 5), 4 weeks, and 3, 6, 12 and 24 months after surgery.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Consecutive women diagnosed with breast cancer and undergoing unilateral surgery with axillary lymph-node dissection at the Príncipe de Asturias Hospital in Alcalá de Henares, Madrid (Spain) are candidates for inclusion in the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients without axillary lymph-node dissection or with bilateral BC, systemic disease, locoregional recurrence, or any contraindication to physical therapy are excluded from the study.
